Title: One dead, two injured as car crashes into truck on Benin-Ore/Ijebu-Ode expressway
Summary: A Toyota car rammed into a moving truck on the Benin-Ore/Ijebu-Ode Expressway in Ogun State . Two persons also sustained varying degrees of injuries from the accident . Involved in the crash .

Title: Insecurity: Kwara youths alert FG, NASS on banditry invasion
Summary: The youths in Isanlu-Isin, Kwara South Senatorial District, have sent a ‘save our soul’ message to federal, state, and local government authorities to rescue them from ceaseless banditry and other related social concerns in their community .

Title: 126m Nigerians secure NIN, database capacity hits 250m – FG
Summary: President Bola Tinubu announced that over 126 million Nigerians have now been enrolled in the National Identity Database . The Federal Government has expanded the system’s capacity from 100 million to 250 million records .

Title: Ogun farmers petition Gov Abiodun over land grabbing activities
Summary: Farmers and residents from five Ilaro communities in Yewa South Local Government Area have raised the alarm over increasing attacks and land encroachment by armed land grabbers . In a petition addressed to the Ogun State Governor, Prince Prince Prince Abiodun .

Title: Tinubu will grace my coronation, says Oba Ladoja
Summary: Oba Rashidi Ladoja says President Bola Tinubu will grace his coronation as Olubadan of Ibadanland . The former Governor of Oyo State will be among the dignitaries who will grace the coronation .

Title: FG introduces single-window platforms for land registration, agricultural credit
Summary: FG introduces single-window platforms for land registration, agricultural credit . Shettima announced fresh incentives to boost agricultural investment under President Tinubu’s Renewed Hope Agenda .

Title: Lagos Inferno: Fire Service assessing structural safety of Afriland Tower
Summary: The Federal Fire Service FFS contained a fire outbreak at Afriland Tower on Broad Street, Lagos Island, on Tuesday evening . It said its personnel remained on the ground to assess the structural safety of the building .

Title: FG’s inflation promise, fake – PDP
Summary: The Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) has dismissed the Federal Government’s claim that inflation will soon drop to a single digit . The PDP described the claim as a false promise aimed at deceiving Nigerians ahead of the next general elections .

Title: Flood hits four communities in Adamawa
Summary: Flood, triggered by a heavy downpour, has affected four communities in Adamawa . Limiwa, Rumde, Shinko, and Jambutu communities were affected .

Title: Bittensor targets $1000, Ethereum builds momentum & BlockDAG pushes ahead with 19,900+ miners rolling out
Summary: Bittensor (TAO) and ETH (ETH) are fueling discussions among traders . Their forecasts and technical setups hint at strong upside potential . BlockDAG pushes ahead with 19,900+ miners rolling out .
